title: Kyle Petty: "Swerve Or Die"
description: Racing superstar Kyle Petty with his memoir "Swerve or Die: Life at My Speed in the First Family of NASCAR Racing." Original air date 10 August 2022. The book was published on 9 August 2022.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Kyle Petty)
